member.devdoc: Gets a service of the desired type. Returns null if the service does not exist or there is no service provider.

member.summary: Raised upon first activation of the form.

member.devdoc: Launches the help for this form.

member.devdoc: Overridden to reroute the context-help button to our own handler.

member.devdoc: The service provider for the form.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.UI.Design.Util.DesignerForm.HelpTopic
member.devdoc: Returns the help topic for the form. Consult with your UE contact on what the appropriate help topic is for your dialog.

member.devdoc: Called when a panel is about to change.

member.devdoc: Goes to the back panel in the wizard.

member.devdoc: Registers a panel for use in this wizard.

member.devdoc: Initializes a WizardForm to use an ordered array of panels.

member.devdoc: Shows the panel specified by the given index.

member.devdoc: The Finish button of the wizard.

member.devdoc: The Next button of the wizard.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.UI.Design.Util.WizardForm.PreviousButton
member.devdoc: The Back button of the wizard.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Web.UI.Design.Util.WizardPanel
member.devdoc: Represents a single step in a wizard. WizardPanels are contained within a single WizardForm.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.UI.Design.Util.WizardPanel.#ctor
member.devdoc: Creates a new WizardPanel.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.UI.Design.Util.WizardPanel.OnComplete
member.devdoc: This method is called when the wizard's Finish button is clicked. It is called once for each wizard panel on the panel stack, in the order from the first panel to the last (current) panel.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.UI.Design.Util.WizardPanel.OnNext
member.devdoc: Runs when the next button is clicked while this panel is showing. Returns true if the wizard should proceed to the next panel.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.UI.Design.Util.WizardPanel.OnPrevious
member.devdoc: Runs when the previous button of the parent wizard form is clicked while this panel is active

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.UI.Design.Util.WizardPanel.Caption
member.devdoc: The caption to be shown on the WizardForm

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.UI.Design.Util.WizardPanel.NextPanel
member.devdoc: The panel to go to when the Next button is clicked. This can be set dynamically in the OnNext() event to customize the order in which panels are used.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.UI.Design.Util.WizardPanel.ParentWizard
member.devdoc: A reference to the WizardForm parenting this panel

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.UI.Design.Util.WizardPanel.ServiceProvider
member.devdoc: The service provider for the wizard.
